content: left needle lift bar between sts from the front knit into back of this new loop yo yarn over bring yarn to front of work and pass it over the right needle 22-26 on these row work lower buttonband across back of cozy as described in pattern work this section twice in full across front as described in pattern on these row work chart across front and shoulder decreases on back k1 ssk knit to 3 sts from end k2tog k1 as described in pattern this pattern is intended for personal non-commercial use please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern or sell items made from it feel free to contact me at gotthebutton@me com if you have any questions about pattern instructions or permitted usage haworth hot water bottle cozy © julie zaichuk-ryan 2012 http //whosgotthebutton wordpress com
